query:
SELECT 
  u.id as userId, u.name, u.email, u.role, u.openId, u.platformOwner,
  a.id as accountId, a.accountName, a.accountPlan, a.accountStatus,
  o.id as orgId, o.name as orgName, o.status as orgStatus,
  om.role as memberRole,
  s.id as subId, s.subStatus, s.subPlanId
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN accounts a ON a.accountOwnerUserId = u.id
LEFT JOIN organizations o ON o.accountId = a.id
LEFT JOIN org_memberships om ON om.userId = u.id AND om.organizationId = o.id
LEFT JOIN subscriptions s ON s.subAccountId = a.id
WHERE u.id IN (1, 2670483, 2670487, 2670488, 2670489)
ORDER BY u.id
